name: XWUI Chip Component
description: Chip/tag component for displaying labels, categories, or removable items. Supports various variants, sizes, closable and clickable states, and icons/avatars.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

closable.description: Whether the chip can be closed/removed

avatar.description: Avatar element or HTML string to display in the chip

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string to display in the chip

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the chip

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

label.description: Label text to display in the chip
